column5: Coming up for my annual summer trip soon, understand new regulations on bringing nightcrawlers across the boarder. Not allowing any across, regardless of bedding now. Thoughts on where to grab some between Baudette and Morson?

This is the third or fourth year for the night crawler ban. So it's not new. You'll find nightcrawlers at Gill's Marina in Morson. If for some odd reason they're out, try Buena Vista Resort around the corner.
we got ours at Gills but if you plan on getting half a flat or more I would call them in advance to order them.
